name: Circle In Square World
description:
INFO

This is the first time i ever entered a game jam, and the first ever published game i do, and i'm really happy that i got in, but the problem is i made the scope of the game too large and i lost the idea of what i wanted to make in the first place, i was aiming for story telling adventure game, but i got curved in the middle to put some actions, cut-scenes, dialogs. But none actually got finished, and eventually i ended up returning to the main idea i was aiming for. The Beginner Circle Game Jam got me a hell of two weeks of hard work and developing and that was so fun, YES nothing came to light of my two week of work but just the experience is enough, and the game has two levels i hope you like them and Thank you Angry Smile owner of the jam for making the jam.

HOW TO PLAY?

The game controls are so simple : 

  • A & left arrow : go left.
  • D & right arrow : go right.
  • W & up arrow : fly up.

Credits

Music are from Robert Tar very amazing track. Sound FX are made with sfxr by drpetter. Sprite Editor is Paint.net. Engine is Superpowers 6.1.

THANKS FOR PLAYING.
